actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the use of official time by Federal employees.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Federal Employee Accountability Act of 2013 - Repeals provisions authorizing official time for any federal employee representing an exclusive representative in the negotiation of a collective bargaining agreement, or in connection with other matters covered under federal government labor-management relations provisions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the use of official time by Federal employees.
